conveyor belt.translation[0].definitions: a long continuous moving band of rubber, cloth, or metal, used in a place such as a factory or an airport to move things from one place to another
We lifted our baggage from the conveyor belt.
conveyor belt.translation[1].definitions: a long continuous moving band of rubber, metal etc, used in a place such as a factory or an airport to move things from one place to another
The sandwiches are placed on a conveyor belt and moved through two sets of cutters, one above and one below the belt.
